About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon, Tues, Thurs, Fri 9am-4:30pm, Wed 9am-8pm, Sat 9:30am-12:30pm; closed Sun and public holidays. General reference assistance available. Copying services for books, journals and photographs available.

About.Access: 1 day's advance notice of visit required. Proof of identity required.

Contact.Street address: Mannum High School, Walker Avenue, Mannum 5238
